subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The United States held Canada to two field goals in a dominant second quarter, pulling away in a 113-63 victory yesterday in Las Vegas to remain unbeaten in the FIBA Americas tournament. Carmelo Anthony scored 25 points and Michael Redd added 19, including five 3-pointers.Kobe Bryant had 15 points, Amare Stoudemire had 12 and LeBron James added 10 points, 8 rebounds and 4 assists. The United States (3-0) closes pool play tonight against Brazil.The former Arkansas player Olumuyiwa Famutimi scored 17 points to lead Canada (2-2).
